name: Delivery (Valore_Studios)
description:
Delivery is a fantasy narrative text adventure about a young girl, and her perilous adventure to help her family!

Jayden is a young girl who is helping her family run their blacksmith forge. She lives in a small fantasy village full of wizards, friends, and family.

Today, Jayden is helping her father with a very important task that will send her on an adventure that will change Jayden forever.

The choices you make will be important and a hero's heart is needed to accomplish this perilous journey.

Delivery is a fantasy narrative text adventure game of choices. We made this game with young children in mind to introduce them to the wonderful world of fantasy adventure.

Choose wisely, and may your heart be pure!
